name: Star Flight
description:
Star Flight is a mobile arcade shoot 'em up game in which you have to fight against an armada of aliens. Dodge their projectiles, shoot them with powerful power-ups and fight your friends for a place on the leaderboard! And also you are waiting for retro graphics and great music.

Special thanks to my comrades who helped with the tests and to one talented composer who wrote the beautiful music that you hear in the game. You can find a link to it in the game itself.

In the game you will meet:

  1. Many enemies.
  2. 18 different waves.
  3. Powerful bonuses.
  4. World leaderboard.
  5. Simple but convenient control on phones.
